forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High 64F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 64F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Decreasing cloudiness and becoming windy. High 61F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny and windy. High 16C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with lots of sunshine. High 62F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. NNW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 46F. NNW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 18C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 18C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 66F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.
